title: Seasons and Seashells
description: Seven great stories. Seven great voices. Seven great reading choices.Seasons and Seashells, an anthology from the Petit Fours and Hot Tamales, will leave you laughing, crying, sighing and wanting more.Love Stories for Every SeasonSeasons change, signaling life’s beginnings and endings. There are as many interpretations of the passage of time and the meaning of love as there are seashells on a sandy beach. For a storyteller, a seashell can signify a token of love, a clue to a murder or memories of the past. In this book, we’re presenting just a few of those stories for you.Anthology Carol BurnsideTami BrothersMarilyn BaronLindy Chaffin StartLinsey LanierPam AsberryMaxine Davis
author: Carol Burnside
